text: "Azərbaycan Hava Yolları" ("Azərbaycan Hava Yolları" QSC), Azerbaijan Airlines (AZAL, Azeri: Azərbaycan Hava Yolları), is the flag carrier of Azerbaijan, based in Baku. Its main base is Heydar Aliyev International Airport in Baku. It is a joint-stock company (JSC). ==Other websites== * Category:Airlines of Asia Category:Airlines of Europe Category:Public transport in Azerbaijan Category:1992 establishments in Azerbaijan
title: Azerbaijan Airlines
